title: continue
description: The AS determines that the request can be continued.

interact_ref.description: The interaction reference from the sender's confirmation.

value.description: The value is an unsigned 64-bit integer amount, represented as a string.

assetCode.title: Asset code
assetCode.description: The assetCode is a code that indicates the underlying asset. An ISO4217 currency code should be used whenever possible. The ISO4217 representation of the US Dollar is USD.

assetScale.title: Asset scale
assetScale.description: The number of decimal places that defines the scale of the smallest divisible unit for the given asset code. It determines how an integer amount is scaled to derive the actual monetary value. For example, USD has an asset scale of 2 with the smallest unit being 0.01. An integer amount of `1000` with an `assetCode` of `USD` and `assetScale` of `2` translates to $10.00.

receiver.title: Receiver
receiver.description: The URL of the incoming payment that is being paid.

access.description: A description of the rights associated with this access token.

type.description: The type of resource request as a string.  This field defines which other fields are allowed in the request object.

actions.description: The types of actions the client instance will take at the RS as an array of strings.

identifier.description: A string identifier indicating a specific resource at the RS.
